Docs.summary: Returns the vector index type to use, such as "flat", "diskANN", or "quantizedFlat". See Vector Search in Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL for more information.
Docs.returns: The index type to use, or if none is set.

Docs.summary: Returns the value indicating whether the index is configured for full-text search. See Full-text search in Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL for more information.
Docs.returns: The index type to use, or if none is set.
